doc:
Malvina Polo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malvina_Polo 0 Malvina Polo (July 26, 1903 – January 6, 2000) was an American film actress. She appeared in several films between 1921 and 1924. She was the daughter of actor Eddie Polo. She died in San Juan Capistrano, California. Malvina_Polo ( July_26_,_1903 – January_6_,_2000 ) was an_American_film_actress . She appeared in several_films between 1921_and_1924 . She was the_daughter of actor_Eddie_Polo . She died in San_Juan_Capistrano , California .
